Translations.Text: ninnalkku nalkunna a vagdanam valare valare viduram tanne
nam'mute i aihikajivitamallate vere jivitamilla. nam jivikkunnu; marikkunnu. namearikkalum uyirttelunnelpikkappetunnavaralla
daivattinre peril kallam ketticcamacca oruttan matramanivan. nannalearikkalum ivanil visvasikkunnavaralla.”
addeham parannu: "enre natha, ivarenne tallipparannirikkunnu. atinal niyenne sahayikkename.”
allahu ariyiccu: "atuttutanne avar keatunkhedattinirayakum.”
avasanam tirttum n'yayamaya nilayil oru ghearagarjanam avare pitikuti. annane namavare cavarukalakki. akramikalaya janattinu nasam
pinne avarkkusesam nam marru talamurakale valarttikkeantuvannu
oru samudayavum atinre niscita avadhikkumump nasikkukayea avadhikkusesam nilanilkkukayea illa

pinnit nam tutarccayayi nam'mute dutanmare ayaccukeantirunnu. orea samudayattilum atinre dutan agatamayappealellam avaraddehatte tallipparannu. appealellam namavare onninupirake marreannayi nasippiccukeantirunnu. annane avare nam kathavasesarakki. visvasikkatta janatakk sarvanasam
pinnit musayeyum addehattinre saheadaran haruneyum nam nam'mute telivukaleateyum vyaktamaya pramanannaleateyum ayaccu
pharaveanreyum avanre pramanipparisakaluteyum atuttekk. appealavar ahankariccu. aud'dhatyam natikkunna janatayayirunnu avar
atinalavar parannu: "nannal nannaleppealettanneyulla rantu manusyaril visvasikkukayea? avarute alukalanenkil namukk atimappani ceyyunnavarum!”
annane avar a rantupereyum tallipparannu. atinalavar nasattinirayayi
musakku nam vedam nalki. atilute avar nervali prapikkan
maryaminre putraneyum avanre matavineyum namearu drstantamakki. avariruvarkkum nam sekaryapradavum uravakalullatumaya oruyarnna pradesatt abhayam nalki
allahuvinre dutanmare, nalla aharapadarthannal bhaksikkuka. salkkarmannal ceyyuka. tirccayayum ninnal pravarttikkunnatinepparriyellam nannayariyunnavanan nam
niscayamayum itan ninnalute samudayam; ekasamudayam. nanan ninnalute nathan. atinal enneat bhaktiyullavaravuka
pakse, pinnitavar kaksikalayippirinn tannalute matatte tuntantuntamakki. orea kaksiyum tannalute vasamullatil trptiyatayunnavaran
atinal oru niscitakalanvare avare tannalute “beadhanketta” avasthayil tutaran vittekkuka
avar vicarikkunnea, sampattum santanannalum nalki namavare sahayiccukeantirikkunnat
namavarkk nanmavaruttan titukkam kuttunnatinalanenn? alla; avar satyavastha tiriccariyunnilla
tirccayayum tannalute nathane bhayannu natunnunnavar
tannalute nathanre vacanannalil visvasikkunnavar
tannalute nathann pankalikale kalpikkattavar
tannalute nathankalekk tiriccucellentavaranallea enna vicarattal dananceyyumpeal hrdayam virapunt danam nalkunnavar
ivareakkeyan nanma ceyyan titukkam kuttunnavar. avayil adyam cennettunnavarum avar tanne
areyum avarute kalivinatitamayatin nam nirbandhikkunnilla. satyam krtyamayi pratipadikkunna oru rekha nam'mute vasamunt. arum orikkalum ottum anitikkirayavilla
ennal, avarute hrdayannal ikkaryattepparri tire asrad'dhaman. avarkk atallatta marrucila panikalanullat. avaratu ceytukeanteyirikkunnu
annane, avarile sukhalealupare siksayal nam pitikutum. appealavar vilapikkan tutannum
ninnalinnu vilapikkentatilla. ninnalkkinn nam'mute bhagattuninn oru sahayavum labhikkukayilla
nam'mute vacanannal ninnale vyaktamayi otikkelppiccirunnallea. appeal ninnal pintirinnupeavukayayirunnu
peannaccam natikkunnavarayi. rakkatha kathanannalil ninnal atepparri asambandham pulampukayayirunnu
avar i vacanattepparri tellum cinticcuneakkiyittille? atalla; avarute purva pitakkalkk vannettiyittillatta onnanea ivarkk vannukittiyirikkunnat
atalla; tannalute dutane paricayamillattatinalanea avaraddehatte tallipparayunnat
atumallenkil addehattin bhrantuntennanea avar parayunnat? ennal ariyuka. satyasandesavumayan addeham avaruteyatutt vannettiyat. ennal avarilerepperum satyatte verukkunnavaran

satyam avarute tannistannale pinparriyirunnuvenkil akasabhumikalum avayilellamullavarum kulappattilakumayirunnu. ennal, nam avarkkulla udbeadhanavumayan avare samipiccat. ennittum avar tannalkkulla udbeadhanam avaganikkukayanuntayat
alla; ni avareatu valla pratiphalavum avasyappetunnuntea? ennal orkkuka: ninre nathanre pratiphalaman mahattaram. avan annadatakkalil atyuttaman tanne
tirccayayum niyavare nervaliyilekkan viliccukeantirikkunnat
ennal, paraleaka visvasamillattavar a nervaliyil ninn terrippeakunnavaran
